description: The flagship Martin Rd café, opened in 2013, introduced specialty coffee to Singapore’s Robertson Quay. This laid-back, greenery-surrounded space offers all-day brunch, coffee, and retail beans. The second floor’s alfresco coffee bar, Grounded by CMCR, features a wellness-focused menu, perfect for gathering and unwinding over quality coffee and snacks.

product1.description:
Reg. S$7, Large S$8.5
Whole milk / low fat milk / outside oat / nobody coconut / bonsai soy
product1.name: Iced Chai Latte
